attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Roman Catholic Church and all Faith adoption agencies should be exempt from the legislation that requires adoption agencies to place children with Homosexual couples. It goes against the religious beliefs and the conscience of Catholics and other Faiths and goes against the right of christians to practise there faith as to their beliefs.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Adoptionprotest/
Also, if you decide to resubmit, the title of a petition should be a call to action and not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
